G

GestionnaireMedieval - Class in controllers.GestionnairesUnivers
The medieval universe controller, which defines custom messages and actions for a medieval game universe.
GestionnaireMedieval() - Constructor for class controllers.GestionnairesUnivers.GestionnaireMedieval
 
GestionnaireUnivers - Class in controllers
Manages the game's context by retrieving (implicitly) the targeted or default universe (its parameters, and its character CRUD).
GestionnaireUnivers() - Constructor for class controllers.GestionnaireUnivers
Initialize the universe context manager by reading a univers.txt file in the current working directory.
GestionnaireWestern - Class in controllers.GestionnairesUnivers
The western universe controller, which defines custom messages and actions for a western game universe.

The main window is a JDialog to add a proper a X11 WM_WINDOW_ROLE and WM_WINDOW_TYPE to a pop-up.
